about.title: What is Blueprint?
about.description: Blueprint is a Create Mod resource site to find addons, schematics, and more!

forcreators.title: For Creators
forcreators.description: We're here to help showcase your addons to the Blueprint community

card.title: Can't find your addon?
card.description: Let us know and we'll help get your addon listed
card.content: Our addon scanning process is fully automated. Contact us to request a rescan and get your addon included in our directory.

about.title: About Blueprint
about.description1: Blueprint emerged from recognizing the need for a centralized platform that serves the Create Mod community effectively. We built this site using modern web technologies to provide a robust solution for discovering and sharing content.
about.description2: Our goal is to consolidate Create Mod resources in one accessible location - connecting addon developers with users and enabling easy sharing of contraption designs. We aim to enhance discoverability and foster collaboration within the community.

card1.title: Discover Addons
card1.description: Browse and manage the growing ecosystem of Create Mod extensions.

card2.title: Share Creations
card2.description: Upload and showcase your automated contraptions and engineering designs.

card3.title: Join Our Community
card3.description: Connect with fellow Create enthusiasts and contribute to the ecosystem.

discord.description: For updates, sneak peeks, and issue reporting.

subtitle.main: Thanks to our awesome contributors. Without you this wouldn't have been possible ❤️
subtitle.api: Also a big thanks to those who helped us building the API ❤️

scrollingaddonbackground.title: 0% of addons have support for Create 0.6
scrollingaddonbackground.subtitle: 'That accounts to ~0 addons totally' - Says our expert
scrollingaddonbackground.tooltip: Grayed icons do not support Create 0.6

404.title: Page Not Found
404.desc: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
404.believe: If you believe this is a bug email us at
